oai_dc:dc.dc:title: De la taille périnéale chez l'homme
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dourry, Mohammed
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Paris : A. Parent, Imprimeur de la Faculté de Médecine, 1869.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Medical dissertation of Mohammed Dourry (Dourri) who studied at the medical faculty at University of Paris in 1869. Dourry was part of the Egyptian Mission to France and possibly the first Egyptian national to receive a Western medical degree.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Perineum--Surgery; Surgical Instruments; Urologic Surgical Procedures--methods
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: xxiv, [25]-98 pages, 4 plates, [2] pages : illustrations (some color)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library, American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
